Class EnemyPlaneV1

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
com.example.demo.Entities.ActiveActor
com.example.demo.Entities.ActiveActorDestructible
com.example.demo.Entities.FighterPlane
com.example.demo.Entities.EnemyPlaneV1
All Implemented Interfaces:
Destructible, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class EnemyPlaneV1 extends FighterPlane
Represents an enemy plane in the game, specifically the version 1 of the enemy plane. This plane moves horizontally across the screen and has the ability to fire projectiles at the player's plane. The plane also features a spinning animation when active and reacts to taking damage.

  • Constructor Details

    • EnemyPlaneV1

      public EnemyPlaneV1(double initialXPos, double initialYPos)
      Constructs a new EnemyPlaneV1 with a specified initial position. The enemy plane is initialized with a spinning animation and a health value.
      Parameters:
      initialXPos - Initial X position of the enemy plane.
      initialYPos - Initial Y position of the enemy plane.

  • Method Details

    • updatePosition

      public void updatePosition()
      Updates the position of the enemy plane by moving it horizontally. The plane moves left at a fixed speed.
      Specified by:
      updatePosition in class ActiveActorDestructible

    • fireProjectile

      public ActiveActorDestructible fireProjectile(UserPlane userPlane)
      Fires a projectile towards the player's plane. The projectile is fired based on the fire rate, which is a random probability check.
      Overrides:
      fireProjectile in class FighterPlane
      Parameters:
      userPlane - The player's UserPlane, used to calculate firing direction (not currently utilized).
      Returns:
      The ActiveActorDestructible object representing the fired projectile, or null if no projectile is fired.

    • updateActor

      public void updateActor()
      Updates the behavior of the enemy plane. This method is called to update the plane’s position based on its movement and fire status.
      Specified by:
      updateActor in class ActiveActorDestructible

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage()
      Applies damage to the enemy plane. This method calls the superclass's takeDamage() method and triggers additional visual effects related to damage.
      Specified by:
      takeDamage in interface Destructible
      Overrides:
      takeDamage in class FighterPlane

    • initializeSpin

      private void initializeSpin()
      Initializes the spinning animation for the enemy plane. The plane rotates continuously with a smooth animation.

    • destroy

      public void destroy()
      Destroys the enemy plane, triggering the destruction sequence including visual effects. The plane is marked as destroyed and the destruction effects are triggered once.
      Specified by:
      destroy in interface Destructible
      Overrides:
      destroy in class ActiveActorDestructible
